getCurrentPosition().Description: Gets current position of the player. If the player is playing/paused, this method returns current position from @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter_E@. Otherwise, if the player is fastforwarding/rewinding, the method fake-pauses the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter_E@ and returns its own calculated position.

getSupportedActions().Description: Returns a bitmask of actions supported by the media player.

ClassDesc: A helper class for managing a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRow_E@ being displayed in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost_E@. It supports standard playback control actions play/pause and skip next/previous. This helper class is a glue layer that manages interaction between the leanback UI components @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRow_E@ @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRowPresenter_E@ and a functional @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter_E@ which represents the underlying media player. Apps must pass a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter_E@ in the constructor for a specific implementation e.g. a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#MediaPlayerAdapter_E@. The glue has two action bars: primary action bars and secondary action bars.
